title: New Update
text: I’ve been a long time user of Snapchat. I’ve never had any issues with it and it was always a mainstream way for me to communicate with my friends and family other than text messaging. I have the app set to automatically update. However I did not think the updates would have gotten as far as they did. This update has added an AI on my friends list and while normally that wouldn’t be particularly an issue for me, the issue is that it can pinpoint my location without my location being on. That not only made me uncomfortable but it made other users and their families uncomfortable as well. It is UNFAIR that Snapchat adds an AI and make it practically difficult to remove. The only way you can remove the AI is to pay a fee for Snapchat + which is unjustified. Why should your users have to pay a fee to remove something that makes them uncomfortable? Many users feel their safety is at risk. I strongly recommend that Snapchat updates faster to allow users to remove the AI or else they will be losing thousands of users.

title: Great but some things…
text:
I love this app and I use it daily, but there are a couple things that could do with some fixes. 

First are the avatars. Can we please just get back the regular bitmojis? Either way, the newest 3d avatar is pretty creepy, and the version from before was fine the way it was. 

Something else I have is just a suggestion. Once someone adds you as a friend and you accept it, the name you appear as stays the same unless they edit your profile name themselves. It would be nice if each time you updated your own name on the app, that anyone who hasn’t already made their own custom name for you would have their version of your name updated their devices as well. That way your newest version of your name could be seen by everyone, not just friends you add after you update it.

title: Starting to move towards a paid platform.
text: Snapchat is starting to become a platform that requires you to pay for many features. It use to be very user friendly and was just a nice way to text friends. Now that they added their new AI bot they are wanting you to pay for their snapchat+ subscription to remove the bot from your feed. The bot is very annoying because it pins it in the top of your feed and it is the first thing that you see when you open your chat. I do not like the bot because it lies to you and Snapchat hasn’t figured out how to make the bot fully functional yet. If you send the bot a snap with a picture(I sent a picture of an Xbox controller) it will ask you what game you are playing, then when you ask if it saw the picture it will feed you a preprogrammed line that Snapchat inputted into it of I am unable to see or process any pictures because I am just an AI in Snapchat. I am very unsatisfied with Snapchat right now and they aren’t giving me and options other than paying in order to remove this bot.

title: Too Many Adverts
text:
This is my main go to app, but it has become increasingly bothersome with the amount of advertisements that pop up! You can’t get through one segment with 5 or more ads. If you’re listening to your phone, but it’s not being held, the ads will drive you nuts. As you’re forced to stop whatever you’re doing to click the ad over to continue with the content. Also now it seams that once single tap to move on is gone and you have to tap the ads 2 to 3 times to get away from it. Plus on one add between stories, I actually clicked on the ad and purchased the item. Which was a bait and switch with the the seller Future love who promptly closed their shop and left me with garbage they were selling for half the price I paid! 

I would gladly pay for my Snapchat to avoid the adverts. But that option is sadly still not available. It makes me want to leave this platform all the way around.

title: Scamming their users
text: I bought the Year subscription for premium features and suddenly my account is deleted. No warning. I’ve seen other people’s accounts get removed and it says harassment/bullying terms” “sexual content terms” “hacking/third party app terms” etc.  Like it specified why the account was removed. Mine just said “community terms.” I was told my account is only temporarily disabled and I can unlock it. Tried unlocking and still couldn’t log in. Was told I need to log in within 30 days or my account will be permanently disabled. I tried unlocking and logging in every day and then it just told me the account doesn’t exist anymore now that I’m past 30days. I’ve lost important photos and messages from my husband. I’ve lost sentimental things I had saved from a friend that was killed recently. AND I sat at the airport for SEVEN HOURS because snapchat was how I communicated with my ride from the airport. I’ve sent a total of 6 emails over the past month with zero reply. DO NOT BUY their upgrade. They will take your money and delete your account.

title: Fake support team! Snapchat doesn’t care about their users
text:
So my account was removed off of Snapchat because a family member pulled a prank on me and used my phone to post something on my private story on Snapchat. Once I got my phone back and went onto Snapchat my account had been terminated because of the post. My ability to use Snapchat as a whole was disabled as well.

When I went to the “customer support team” it took 2 days and about 6 emails for them to finally get back to me. But don’t be fooled by the fake names they use, Snapchat’s “support team” are just automated robot replies. They did absolutely nothing to restore my account or provide any help at all on this issue.

This is super dissapointing especially with an app as big as Snapchat, you’d think that they’d care about a user’s experience when using the app, but nope. I need Snapchat to communicate with schoolmates, certain coworkers, and I had years of memories on there that are now completely gone just because Snapchat is too lazy to drop a penny on customer support.

title: WORST APP EVER
text: Eventually snapchat will screw you over. I never thought it would happen to me but it did. There are many cases I looked into where Snapchat would unexpectedly without warning delete accounts and ban the device from logging in or even making a new account. That happened to me. I was unexpectedly logged out with the note that my account was permanently gone. I tried logging into my spare accounts and it would tell me they were locked too. It won’t let me access my spare accounts or even allow me to make another. It would tell me that I have no connection when I do. I have full bars on wifi and service and even moved locations to see if that would change anything. Everything else works on my phone but Snapchat wants nothing to do it. It will happen to everyone eventually and there is nothing anyone can do about it because Snapchat support doesn’t want to help anyone with any problem. They just give you suggestions and not even an option to speak to anyone via email or over the phone.

title: Infuriated
text: I have had snapchat since 2014. A few months back my account was hacked and the hacker posted something that violated community guidelines. I’ve tried everything to get it back but somehow the most popular social media messaging app in the world doesn’t have a PHONE NUMBER TO CALL🤦‍♂️I’ve tried emailing I’ve tried using their support page and it’s always the same thing. I’m told that I will not be able to get my account back for so and so long. I have lost 8 YEARS worth of memories I used this app RELIGIOUSLY. First thing I did when I woke up was check my Snapchat. All I want at this point is the ability to create a new account I’ve come to terms with the fact that I’ll never get those 8 YEARS of memories back but all I have to say is if you have never had snapchat DONT GET IT. The customer support is non existent and it’s just as easy for someone to hack your account as it was mine and boom all those memories and everything go right down the drain. I used to love this app but I don’t foresee the device ban being lifted so yeah. Stay away.

title: Bitmoji Changes
text:
Okay so let’s get into this:
The app itself is alright. I use it often and it’s a good way to stay connected to people. However, the bitmoji changes and updates are out of hand. I designed my bitmoji when it was first just the simple cartoons and I thought they were so cute. Then, they made them all 3D… okay. I got used to it. Still not my preference but whatever. BUT THEN, I open the app today and they changed it AGAIN… and NOT in a good way. I now look like a flat-faced man in a wig. I am not a man and nor do I want to look like one. 

Snapchat, this is out of control. Please stop, I hate the creepy new look of the bitmojis and so do others I’ve talked to about this. Bring back the old ones PLEASE. I understand you need to do new things to stay “trendy” and “cool”. But let me tell you, you can still have your 15 minutes of fame and not have the new Bitmojis. All press isn’t good press, and it will not be good press if you continue down this path of repetitive tomfoolery. Please fix this.

title: AI
text: I deleted Snapchat due to the AI which isn’t surprising based on all the other recent reviews. Made this post 5 stars just so it will be seen by others…. If you pay snapchat monthly you can literally track your friends exact whereabouts and it will leave like a snail trail of everywhere that you have been within a given amount of time (another reason to have your location off and also be in ghost mode and don’t add strangers because they could track you down) also you shouldn’t have to pay to remove an AI to me that feels like theft. And just for those 2 things alone snapchat will lose a lot of business because people would rather go back to just texting over the phone versus paying money to git rid of the AI… just goes to show that Snapchat is being greedy for money.

title: It’s very good, but…
text: I think the app is AMAZING in general. On this app you are able to contact your friends, family, significant others very easily. Not only can you message them, but you can call, send photos, videos, very quickly. You can also have this score with the people you know called a snap streak, which I think is very awesome, but there is just one downside that I think is not right. I noticed from going to one of my friends profiles, we have saved many photo, videos, and some chat attachments, but there’s also something else I noticed. There wasn’t a voice message save section, the voice message feature is very cool and I love it and there are many memories in those types of messages. I don’t like scrolling through chats, because it takes a long time. It also wastes time to scroll so long. So I really hope that Snapchat will eventually come up with a voice chat save section feature.

title: Surprising right?
text: It’s Snapchat, what’s not to like. You send pictures or receive pictures from whoever you want. It’s free. It’s got it’s own Snapchat version of TikTok. You can see peoples stories. You can even text!!!! Although beware… a lot of predators lurk in the deep dark caves of unexplored quickadds. Other than that I would say it’s all around great. Well, one more issue I face is not being able to pin anyone now unless I pay for premium. Snapchat needs to stay simple and easy. That’s why we liked it to begin with. I understand you need micro transactions but you could make them another way ex: certain clothing for bitmoji costs money, making certain filters cost money etc. but you don’t gotta make the pin cost hella money. All in all I’m still satisfied with the app, and have minimal complaints

title: Great app parents look at this review
text: Snapchat is great, you get to pick who can see your story or make a private story, you can i freind people and it’s just your freinds that veiw your story, you can also make a private story where limited people are able to see it, communicating is great because you can add and remove any freinds you would like. i know a lot of parents are worried abt trolls and stuff but you will get a freind request before it automaticaly adds a freind, you can invite and add freinds. the only bad thing is a few inappropriate stories but you can always report or get rid of that story or even freind. you can also look back and delete things from your story after you’ve added them, you can also see who viewed it, parents please allow your kid too have this app

title: Excessive notifications finally pushed me to delete
text:
Kept Snapchat all these years because some of my friends still use it. Noticed lately that the notification banner on the app tile would pop up even if I hadn’t received a direct Snapchat from friends. Seeing the banner would obviously incentivize me to open the app as I assume it means I’d gotten a Snapchat. However, I would open the app up to nothing multiple times. Perhaps it’s a notification banner for stories or the discovery page of miscellaneous content? 

This felt frustrating and misleading after multiple times of opening the app to nothing. I don’t use Snapchat to discover new content. I use IG and tik tok for that. Snapchat’s differentiator for me is that it’s a direct way for me to communicate with friends. I don’t care about any of its other features. It shouldn’t try to be another tik tok or IG…it does not win in that space. Anyway, good riddance to this app. This notification change finally pushed me to offload it finally.

title: I used to love it
text: I use Snapchat a lot to take photos and videos with filters and save them to look at later or to post them on other apps but y’all have added this feature that is so beyond frustrating your ghost logo pops up with what filter is in the picture and it’s not even optional. I don’t know if I’ll be able to find another app that I like just as much as I did for Snapchat but I’m gonna have to try because I really don’t wanna have to take every single video and picture sideways so I’m able to crop out this feature if this is something y’all are gonna be stubborn on can you at least make it optional I feel like I can’t save any of the photos or videos I take anymore with filters and the whole reason why I have Snapchat is for the filters. Other than that I’ve had Snapchat since 2017 and I’ve always been happy with it until now. It’s a good app but I think this feature is a mistake.

title: Steven James
text:
Snapchat presents an innovative canvas for social interaction, where the joy of artistry meets seamless communication. The inclusion of our painting feature adds a personal touch to messages, fostering creativity among users. The exclusive AI friend removal feature provides a unique twist to content creation. Additionally, the monthly emoji and the ability to change the app icon monthly through subscription elevate the experience, offering a touch of customization that keeps the platform fresh and enjoyable. 

My primary concern with the app is the lack of live activities for Snapchat Plus subscribers on the dynamic island. I genuinely hope that the Snapchat developers respond to this crucial feedback. It is essential for users to have access to live activities at their fingertips while engaging in text conversations or checking a friend's location.

title: The Whole Idea is cool :)
text:
I like Snapchat because random people can’t view your story or posts if you don’t allow them to be your friend. The filters are hilarious and super fun to use, it’s really quick to use since my camera keeps acting up. Another thing is if you have an online friend who has your Snapchat, and if you exchange pictures, you can tell if it’s real or stolen. Like if it reads “from camera roll” you can tell it wasn’t just taken. So that is one good way to tell if they are really who they are, not to mention you can see their stories and bitmoji anyway. Correct me if I’m wrong about the online friend thing, so I don’t trick people through a fake sense of safety. That’s just what I think. Over all, I like Snapchat a lot and my friends respond to me more with the app.

Thanks!

title: Great for communication, terrible explore algorithm.
text:
I appreciate Snapchat for it’s communication interface, but the explore pages, regardless of how hard I try to adjust the algorithm, are always showing me obnoxious celeb tabloids, gross medical videos, horrific true crime stories, and trash YouTubers’ public stories. It’s all junk food for the brain. 

While I understand that can be entertaining for some, it’s so maddening to open the app and be exposed to so much of that stuff when I work so hard to limit my intake of that. What’s worse is that the stuff people do subscribe to and want to look at is minimized to a little margin at the top. 

I personally often space that it’s there. My eye is drawn to the new stuff, which from a marketing perspective, feels intentional - and while I understand the benefit of being exposed to new creators, I wish I had more agency over the kind of creators I’m exposed to on SC. It makes me not want to linger on the app, and I view the platform to have less integrity than TikTok or Insta.

title: Calling
text: Snapchat is really nice to use when it comes to knowing when people read and don’t read your messages and when you get a notification when someone is typing or sent something. It’s really fun to watch all of the stories and everything. One thing I don’t like is when the snap calls give out so much, that’s really annoying along with the ads but that’s for a different time. Me and my boyfriend are going long distance soon and we are trying to get used to sleeping on call and calling more in general but we can’t do that very well when the calls keep giving out and it’s truly annoying, our internet is fine and it goes for hours but sometimes during the day it gives out but it’s mainly at night, it’ll just keep giving out and it’s super irritating.

title: Snapchat = Skype
text: Snapchat used to be something new and different, but since its launch the picture quality is still horrendous and fails to stay up to date with modern phones. The AI addition has to be one of the dumbest business decisions to date. The AI is worthless, offers very little usability, and is pinned at the top of your messages everyday. All this is bad enough, then you get to the app breaking bugs and crashes. The app will just lock you out of your phone if it crashes (it crashes extremely often). Along with that a majority of the filters are just nothingness and slow down the already slow app even more. There a many more issues that I didn’t have time to list, but simply put Snapchat hasn’t improved in at all in many many years. They went from an app that changed modern communication and they have since made themselves an afterthought. Snapchat is the new Skype, it’s only a matter of time before it’s Zoom takes its entire market share and us users will likely benefit from it.

title: Snapchat camera access
text:
Snapchat is a really good social media app to connect with friends. However, I had recently deleted Snapchat to free up some storage. I had downloaded it again and logged in. It had asked me to turn on camera access and to go to settings, when I had reached settings, there was no camera access button. Unfortunately you can’t access Snapchat if you didn’t give the camera permissions. I can’t log in and text my friends, I don’t know why there is no camera option on the Snapchat permissions in settings. I don’t know if it is my phone or there’s something wrong. I haven’t been able to contact my friends or family on their. 

TO SNAPCHAT: please look into it, if its my phone that’s the issue, can you please try to make Snapchat accessible without giving the camera permissions, so people with this problem can still access it? Thanks, I hope you guys read this.

title: Stop messing with my memories!
text: You need to make it an option to have all these  extra options in the memories. I don’t want memories from this week from my camera roll, I don’t want random day memories, I don’t want everyday memories from my camera roll and my snap memories at the same time. I’ve just been getting more & more frustrated with all these changes and updates rather than happy with them. I think all these new things should be optional.

title: A very popular subpar app
text:
I only use snapchat because everyone else uses Snapchat. In all honesty it is a good way to keep up with friends and to communicate. That being said everything else about this app is unintuitive. The user interface changes almost randomly. Features move around and become harder to find. App crashing bugs appear randomly. Just a list of a few problems the app has functionally. On top of those issues is the way Snapchat has a negative impact on the people who use it. Snapchat is far from kid friendly and in fact is an easy way to distribute and hide inappropriate content. Not only that Snapchat themselves promote borderline adult content in the “stories” section of that app. If you want a daily dose of cringe just take a look at any of the content “stories” section. It is filled with abominations. Anyways that all being said. Snapchat fix your app. Stop being a drain to society. Don’t use this app if you don’t have any reason to.

Also my AI makes it worse. Get rid of Snapchat plus

title: annoying ai
text:
i’ve honestly never really had any issues in the six years i’ve snap, at all, up until this point. finding out that i have to pay money to remove the ai bot is just absurd, why on earth was this not an optional feature? and even THEN- even if there was no way to delete the bot from your friends- why can i not just clear it’s chat from my chat list? why does it need to be obnoxiously sitting at the top of my chats permanently?? 

oddly enough there was an option a week or two ago to clear it in settings, and so i did, and it somehow made its way right back. while i have zero interest in using the bot, i did ask it if there was a way to clear it’s chat on the free version, which it said i could and told me to go in settings like i did previously. but the option is no longer there. 

seems like they’re desperate for people to buy snapchat+. if you have to shove a new feature in everyone’s faces and have their annoyance be the incentive to buy snapchat+, then i guess it really didn’t offer anything that people thought was worth paying for to begin with.

at the end of the day, what the heck does an ai bot really add to this app? what do you gain from it as a user? the entire point is to provide a way to communicate with friends and people, so why would i opt to talk to something that isn’t even real? i get that apps already collect your data, but did they really need to make it so blatantly obvious and extra creepy?

it’s just obnoxious :/

title: Gone completely downhill
text: Snapchat used to be one of the best messaging apps, but now it’s just become entirely obnoxious to use. They keep adding random features that NO ONE actually wanted or likes, which has made Snapchat so annoying to use. Why would they make it so it automatically opens someone’s story if you open the “stories” page??? I get you can swipe instead but honestly what was the point of that? It’s annoying to open up some random person’s story when I didn’t want it to. Not to mention, now it doesn't actually hide the muted stories. They still pop up like normal. Also, no matter HOW MANY TIMES I press “stop seeing this ad” on an ad I’ve gotten maybe 2,478 times now, IT KEEPS POPPING UP!!! Ads in general have gotten out of hand on Snapchat, but there is one specific ad for an app I have NO interest in and DO NOT WANT but they keep pushing it on me. I keep reporting it. I keep getting it. I don’t recommend snapchat to anyone anymore. It’s not enjoyable or easy to use, just a hassle and more of a bother than it’s worth.

title: Have a issue, and a question
text:
Love the app 100%, but I got temporarily locked out of my account, and not sure why? Was wondering how long it would be before I am able to log back in or what to do, not wanting to lose this account seeing as how I save all my pictures to memories and don’t wanna lose them all. 
Also not sure why I was locked out, and I went to the website to see or to try to contact support but there isn’t much help there? A little confused and really frustrated, a while back someone created a new acc without me knowing and used my info and pictures to do something that shouldn’t have been done, and that account got banned, not sure if it could be why this one was as well due to the fact that it was on my device…
Any help is appreciated! Thank you!

Been using snap for almost a decade now, before they were shoving ads with political agendas down your throat. Now, almost everything is followed by an ad. When they first rolled them out, it’d be one or two here and there, no bother. Now? You can’t even make it through a story without at least 4+ ads popping up, and they got smart and made them mandatory to watch. Waste of a great app, honestly. If you’re using it to snap people it’s not as bad, but if you try to access other content, it’s a nightmare. Plus their ads are so obviously politically driven it’s not even funny. And if you’re the person saying “they’re not politically driven ads”, you’re probably the person those ads are for. I wish they’d stop with the mandatory ad stuff, and I also wish they’d stop shoving the same ads with different names down my throat despite me reporting them as harassing and irrelevant to me. Oh well, though. Social media itself is going down the toilet, might as well throw this one into the mix too. It was bound to happen at some point.

title: Great App, But…
text: This app is amazing and great it’s allowed me to talk to my friends and stay in touch with them more! But my only dislike about this app is the new feature of “My AI” I do not have Snapchat+ and can not get it and due to that I’m not able to remove it from my chat feed. I have tried all the ways to get rid of the AI but nothing works. I even went on tiktok to see if there were ways to take it off, but again it only worked for some people and many people were fed up with the new feature and it staying at the very top of the feed. My friends could not get rid of it either and dislike this feature as well. So if you could please let me know how to remove it from my feed or show us a way to get rid of the AI without Snapchat+ to disable the feature. Thank you!

title: Reasons I like Snapchat and hate it

title: A.I. Frustration
text:
I love Snapchat and it’s one of my most used apps! However, the recent addition of the A.I. feature is really frustrating. I would really appreciate if there was a feature that you could at least take the A.I. off of your home screen on the app. I understand people use it but I don’t care for it being pinned at the top of my feed. I know on Snapchat plus there is an option to take it off your Home Screen but I know a lot of people would appreciate the option to un pin it from the feed on Snapchat. I personally don’t use the A.I. feature at all, so it’s a bit frustrating that I cannot get it off my screen. When it first came out there was an option to take it off the main screen and that was greatly appreciated. However, since then it has popped back up and I cannot get it off my screen. 

Thank you

title: It’s a great app just some of the people on it aren’t
text: It’s mainly known for people sending nudes and such not for making friends and that’s just sad, I got used for nudes so many times I got blackmailed a few times too, so if you’re under the age of 13 or 14 please don’t get this app you’re not ready for it please wait it doesn’t matter if all the other kids have snap and you don’t please wait til you’re older don’t join at 7-8 like I did and when you do join do NOT send nudes, it’ll put you down a path in life I promise you don’t wanna go down, so many things can happen and that’s the main reason I stopped sending because before I saw no harm in it but then I got older and more and more people asked, so I do not recommend Snapchat for people younger than 13, please don’t get it til you’re older.

title: I’m Disappointed.

title: SnapChat 2023
text:
I have had snapchat for around a year now. With this generation using it as its main form of communication, I felt like I needed it to be apart of society. Before this month, Snapchat has been nothing but a blessing. I’ve been able to communicate with more old friends, talk to my foreign friends, and up until now I’ve felt save. This all changed with the creation of the SnapChat AI. This new program is horrible. Not only does it LIE to you about the person data it collects but, it also has access to your location (though the internet claims it doesn’t) and it  CAN see your photos (which it also claims it doesn’t) ive seen countless examples of the Bot being a total invasion of privacy and this scared me so much that I have now deleted the app for my safety. In case your wondering, Premium does NOT get rid of the Bot, this is just a money making scam. Please do not allow your children to download this app if you want to protect them. Im truly appalled and hurt by SnapChat and I will never be redownloading. 
Thank you.

title: Ai bot
text: Snapchat has been a foundational feature in the way I communicate with friends for almost ten years now. However the recent update with the chat bot made me questions why I don’t move off the app and just use text. It’s not that I have an issue with chat bots, it’s in the increasing push for a paywall on this app. You currently need Snapchat + to remove the chat bot from your food or it will stay on the VERY top of your recent messages. This shows that Snapchat KNOWS people will want to be able to remove this Incessant push of a new feature, but they are willing to make you pay for this. It would be different if everyone could remove it but it goes to show that they knew people would want to remove it, but don’t care. They’re simultaneously pushing two of their features down users throats. I just don’t understand the blatant removal of user friendliness on this app for better quarterly numbers. Please fix this soon or I fear Snapchat could be heading down a path of increasing monetization that will make it obsolete.

title: Love it something isn’t right
text: When I go to change my avatar/bitmoji  I hit change avatar but it takes me to a greenish black page that says“allow website” but before I can click that it goes back to the homepage and a red bar appears on top of my screen that says “unavailable please try again later” I’ve tried many days and it always says the same thing even if I have full connection and I’ve tried redownloading the app and it did not work. I’ve started to get really frustrated with this error because my avatar needs fixing. Ive looking at friends avatar and they’ve tried to see what is wrong but they do not know.
